text: Jason Acu単a (born May 16, 1973), he is mostly known as Wee-Man, is an American TV personality, stunt performer and actor. He is one of the crew members for Jackass and starred in all of its movies. Acu単a has achondroplasia, a form of dwarfism. Acu単a was born on May 16, 1973 in Pisa, Italy with a Chilean origin. He was raised in Torrance, California.
